title: Venus in Libra
summary: Relationships emphasize balance, reciprocity, and social grace. Beauty, fairness, and shared decision-making take priority. The opportunity is to create harmony without losing your own stance.

meaning.headline: Connection values cooperation, elegance, and clear agreements.

frames.text: Venus in Libra highlights diplomacy, partnership, and aesthetic attunement.
Charm and fairness support negotiations and social ease.
Shared experiences and collaborative art feel appealing.
Decisions are weighed for mutual benefit.
Harmony requires self-erasure or constant agreement.

do: Name your needs before asking others for theirs.
Use clear language even when aiming for harmony.
Schedule time to decide instead of deferring endlessly.
Let aesthetics support honesty, not hide it.
avoid: Letting others choose everything to keep peace

reusable_lines.text: Balance works best when your own preferences are in the mix.
Grace and clarity can travel together today.

allowed_framing: Supportive framing: can ease collaboration and social charm
Agency-forward language: you choose how to balance needs
Contextual framing: politeness helps when matched with truth

sources: Venus as relating/values archetype in daily cycles
